attributes.action: Remove Sadiq Khan as mayor of London.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan has only been elected Mayor of London recently and already has shown he's against the democratic vote of the people and wants to remove London away from the rest of the country and side with Nicola Sturgeon. This is an act of betrayal to the majority of this countries people who voted out

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is accountable to the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament.
